languages.text: Страшный грохот пробился сквозь рев бури — грохот сражения. За ним последовал чей-то яростный и исполненный боли крик.
A terrible rumbling cuts through the roar of the storm — the clash and clamour of battle. It is followed by a furious, agonised scream.
languages.original_text: Страшный грохот пробился сквозь рев бури — грохот сражения. За ним последовал чей-то яростный и исполненный боли крик.

traits.locale_text: A terrible rumbling cuts through the roar of the storm — the clash and clamour of battle. It is followed by a furious, agonised scream.
A terrible rumbling cuts through the roar of the storm — the clash and clamour of battle. It is followed by a furious, agonised scream.
A terrible rumbling cuts through the roar of the storm — the clash and clamour of battle. It is followed by a furious, agonised scream.
A terrible rumbling cuts through the roar of the storm — the clash and clamour of battle. It is followed by a furious, agonised scream.

languages.text: 一阵恐怖的轰隆声穿破了风暴的咆哮声。风暴中传来了战斗的怒吼声与武器的碰撞声，随后传来了一声愤怒而痛苦的尖叫。
languages.original_text: A terrible rumbling cuts through the roar of the storm — the clash and clamour of battle. It is followed by a furious, agonised scream.

traits.locale_text: 一阵恐怖的轰隆声穿破了风暴的咆哮声。风暴中传来了战斗的怒吼声与武器的碰撞声，随后传来了一声愤怒而痛苦的尖叫。

languages.text: 激しい鳴動が嵐の轟音を切り裂く。戦闘で互いがぶつかり合う騒々しい音だ。その後に猛烈な苦悶の叫びが続く。
languages.original_text: A terrible rumbling cuts through the roar of the storm — the clash and clamour of battle. It is followed by a furious, agonised scream.

traits.locale_text: 激しい鳴動が嵐の轟音を切り裂く。戦闘で互いがぶつかり合う騒々しい音だ。その後に猛烈な苦悶の叫びが続く。

languages.text: Un estruendo exagerado atraviesa el rugido de la tormenta: el fragor y el clamor de la batalla, seguido de un grito furioso y agónico.
languages.original_text: A terrible rumbling cuts through the roar of the storm — the clash and clamour of battle. It is followed by a furious, agonised scream.

traits.locale_text: Un estruendo exagerado atraviesa el rugido de la tormenta: el fragor y el clamor de la batalla, seguido de un grito furioso y agónico.

languages.text: Soudain, le fracas et la clameur d'un combat se font entendre par-dessus le rugissement de la tempête, suivis d'un hurlement de rage et de douleur.
languages.original_text: A terrible rumbling cuts through the roar of the storm — the clash and clamour of battle. It is followed by a furious, agonised scream.

traits.locale_text: Soudain, le fracas et la clameur d'un combat se font entendre par-dessus le rugissement de la tempête, suivis d'un hurlement de rage et de douleur.

languages.text: Ein schreckliches Grollen übertönt das Brüllen des Sturms – Kampfgeräusche. Es folgt ein zorniger Schmerzensschrei.
languages.original_text: A terrible rumbling cuts through the roar of the storm — the clash and clamour of battle. It is followed by a furious, agonised scream.

traits.locale_text: Ein schreckliches Grollen übertönt das Brüllen des Sturms – Kampfgeräusche. Es folgt ein zorniger Schmerzensschrei.

languages.text: Korkunç bir gürültü, fırtınanın uğultusunu kesiyor. Çatışma sesleri duyuluyor, ardından da öfkeli, acılı bir çığlık yankılanıyor.
languages.original_text: A terrible rumbling cuts through the roar of the storm — the clash and clamour of battle. It is followed by a furious, agonised scream.

traits.locale_text: Korkunç bir gürültü, fırtınanın uğultusunu kesti. Savaş çatışmasının sesleri duyuldu ve ardından öfkeli, acılı bir çığlık yankılandı.
